publication.title: On the Accuracy of RFID-based Localization in a Mobile Wireless Network Testbed
publication.authors: vikram munishwar,xiaoshuang wang,christopher mitchell,kartik gopalan,nael b. abu-ghazaleh
publication.jconf: IEEE International Conference on Pervasive Computing and Communications
publication.keyword: Experimental Evaluation;Large Scale;Local System;Mobile Wireless Network;Mobility Pattern;multi-hop wireless network;Network Topology;Rfid Tag;Wireless Network;Mobile Node;
publication.abstract: The extensive recent research in protocols develop- ment for wireless networks must be complemented with simple yet efficient prototyping and evaluation mechanism. MiNT-2 is a miniaturized multi-hop wireless network testbed that addresses this challenge by combining the benefits of existing protocol evaluations strategies: simulations and custom built large scale wireless network testbeds. A key component of MiNT-2 is the ability
